state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First of all, venture west. And then, lift the type 3 latchkey from the floor of the canteen. And then, venture east. After that, unlock the type 3 gateway within the cubicle with the type 3 latchkey. Then, make it so that the type 3 gateway is open. Then, make an attempt to go to the east. And then, make an effort to head east. With that over with, try to move south. With that accomplished, go west. Okay, and then, try to move south. Once you do that, move east. With that accomplished, take a trip east. Following that, try to venture north. Following that, retrieve the fondue from the floor of the shower. Alright, thanks! -= Cubicle =- You are in a cubicle. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure. You can make out an armchair. The armchair is normal. But the thing is empty. There is a closed type 3 gateway leading east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west. > -= Cubicle =-0/1
next_state: -= Canteen =- Guess what, you are in the place we're calling the canteen. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is a type 3 latchkey on the floor. > -= Canteen =-0/2

next_state: -= Scullery =- If you're wondering why everything seems so ordinary all of a sudden, it's because you've just walked into the scullery. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building. You make out a refrigerator. The refrigerator is empty! What a waste of a day! Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a rack. However, the rack, like an empty rack, has nothing on it. You move on, clearly depressed by TextWorld. There is an open type 3 gateway leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. > -= Scullery =-0/7
